revised_title: Obituary of Edward Forbes: A Pioneering Geologist and Naturalist
tldr: The obituary of Edward Forbes, a renowned geologist and naturalist, highlights his significant contributions to the fields of zoology, paleontology, and geology. Forbes' early interest in art and science, his extensive travels, and his work on the 'Theory of Bathymetrical Distribution of Life' are discussed. His role as a curator, paleontologist, and lecturer is also mentioned, as well as his personal qualities that made him a beloved figure in the scientific community.
